name: Srikrishna Paradise Hotel
description:
Boasting a restaurant, Srikrishna Paradise Hotel in Thane is situated 14 km from Kanheri Caves. Located around 9 km from Viviana Mall, the hotel is also 14 km away from Suraj Water Park. Guests can have a drink at the bar.All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property.Speaking English, Hindi and Marathi, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 16 km from Srikrishna Paradise Hotel.

name: Hotel Vrushali inn
description:
Overview
Hotel Vrushali Inn is a great choice for travellers looking for a budget accomodation in Navi Mumbai. It is located in Rabale.This Hotel stands out as one of the highly recommended hotel in Navi Mumbai and is recommended by 92% of our guests. Hotel is rated 4.2 out of 5, which is considered as very good.

From all the Budget hotels in Navi Mumbai, Hotel Vrushali Inn is very much popular among the tourists. A smooth check-in/check-out process, flexible policies and friendly management garner great customer satisfaction for this property. The Hotel has standard Check-In time as 12:00 PM and Check-Out time as 11:00 AM. It is a couple-friendly property, hence it is absolutely safe for unmarried couples to stay here.

You can contact the hotel directly for early check-in or late check-out. Early check-in or late check-out is subject to availability and may be chargeable by Hotel Vrushali Inn.

name: Dev shelters
description: Dev Shelters is a good option for travellers looking out for apartment in Mumbai. It is located in Malad. Apartment is rated 3.5 out of 5, which is considered as good. Some of the popular transit points from Dev Shelters are Bandra Terminus (14.5 kms), Mahim Railway Station (17.0 kms), Marine Lines Railway Station (27.7 kms) and Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport (11.9 kms). The Apartment is in proximity to some popular tourist attractions and other places of interest in Mumbai. Some of the tourist attractions near Dev Shelters Oberoi Mall (3.1 kms), Zara Store in Oberoi Mall, Mumbai (3.1 kms), Manori Beach (5.6 kms), ISKCON Mandir Sri Sri Radhagiridhari Mandir (9.0 kms), Uttan Virgin Beach (10.2 kms), Juhu Beach (11.9 kms) and Dattani Square Mall (18.6 kms).

name: Hotel Elvis inn
description:
Welcome to Elvis.Inn, a contemporary boutique hotel located in the heart of the Mumbai Suburb, just steps away from the latest upcoming business hubs.

Located at a distance of 2 mi and 3.2 mi from the international and domestic airports, Mumbai. Elvis.Inn is located in the heart of Powai, surrounded by Haiko, R City and D Mart Shopping Mall. Property offers free parking.

Powai is a great choice for travellers interested in nightlife, street food and Indian food.

The Perfect choice for business travellers, vacationing couples, families, students and professors. Couples in particular like the location they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip. Here you II find a modern, stylish sensibility with friendly service all white being surrounded by dozens of dining, shopping and entertainment choice.
address: 1st Floor, Narayan Plaza Near Boomerang Corporate Center, Chandivali, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400072

name: Hotel Grande 51
description: Location: Hotel Grande 51 is situated in in the financial power house of india, an amalgamation of wealth, glamour and fame, Mumbai. Hotel Grande 51 is an earmark property that offers splendid comfort to its guests. It is situated at a distance of 30 km from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport and 32 km from Andheri Railway Station. Room Amenities: The property has well furnished rooms with soothing interiors ensuring a comfortable and luxurious stay for guests. The rooms are equipped with air conditioner, television, in room safe, coffee maker, mini bar, electronic safe, telephone. Each room has attached bathroom with regular supply of hot/cold water and essential toiletries. Hotel Facilities: An array of all essential services are rendered by the hotel for a hassle free stay that includes Wi-Fi, room service, front desk and many other services. The warm and supportive staff ensures any and every whim is met at the earliest.
address: Plot No.51, Thapar Complex, Sector 15, CBD Belapur, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra 400614

name: Hotel Anant Palace
description:
Anant Palace is situated in Navi Mumbai, within 5 km of Sagar Vihar and 6 km of Inorbit Mall, Vashi. Featuring a restaurant, hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. The rooms in Anant Palace are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Staff at Anant Palace are available to provide advice at the 24-hour front desk.DY Patil Cricket Stadium is 9 km from the hotel, while Nerul Lake and nature park is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport Mumbai Airport, 13 km from Anant Palace.

name: Hotel Metro Palace
description: This property is located in Bandra, also known as the Queen of the Suburbs. Hotel Metro Palace is close to the local metro station, which makes accessing sights in Mumbai easy. Attractions in the vicinity include Mount Mary's Basilica, one of the city's most famous churches, the shops of Linking Road, and Bandstand - all excellent to spend a leisurely evening. Hotel Metro Palace offers complimentary internet access in all guestrooms, cars for rent, and dining facilities on-site.
address: 355, Ramdas nayak marg, hill road bandra west, Mumbai - 400050

name: Hotel Daisy Residency
description: Hotel Daisy Residency lies close to Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport. Hotel Daisy Residency offers 65 impressive rooms that are well-maintained and adequately furnished. Hotel Daisy Residency has a furnished lobby for guests to relax and meet people, a fully-stocked pantry with essentials for a quick snack, third-party laundry service and elevators for easy access. Hotel Daisy Residency has an inventory of 65 rooms that are tastefully-designed and adequately furnished with a comfortable bed, wardrobe and smoking room.
address: 36, Mariam Apartment, Mahakali Caves Rd, opposite Sher E Punjab, Gurudwara, Sher E Punjab Colony, Andheri East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400093

HotelOtherInfo.content: If you cancel more than 24 hours notice you pay ZERO rupees as your cancellation fee.
The normal hotel policy is not to charge for children if they are under 6 years of age.

All guests Foreigners as well as Indian Nationals are required to provide the hotel with valid photographic proof of identity and address proof like Passport, Driving license or Aadhar Card. One must remember pan card is not acceptable as your identity card, also carry the original one. check in time 12 pm, checkout 11 am

name: Rangoli Retreat
description:
Rangoli Retreat Matheran is a good choice for travellers looking for a 3 star hotel in Matheran. It is located in Near Matheran Train Station. Hotel is rated 3.5 out of 5, which is considered as Good. A popular transit point from the hotel is Matheran Railway Station (93 mtrs). The Hotel is in proximity to some popular tourist attractions and other places of interest in Matheran. Some of the tourist attractions include Matheran Shiv Mandir (1.3 kms) and Pisharnath Temple (1.8 kms).

From all the 3 Star hotels in Matheran, Rangoli Retreat Matheran is very much popular among the tourists. A smooth check-in/check-out process, flexible policies and friendly management garner great customer satisfaction for this property. name: Hotel radana
description: Mumbai is 23 km from the accommodation, while Navi Mumbai is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 23 km from FabHotel Radana.
address: Sector 19 C Behind APMC Police Station Vashi Navi Mumbai

HotelOtherInfo.content:
Located in Turambhe, FabHotel Radana features a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. The hotel has a fax machine and photocopier and an ATM machine that guests can use.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast is available daily at FabHotel Radana.
Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to accommodation type. Please enter the dates of your stay and check the conditions of your required room.
